ai-pp1.1:1.1_0: Reverence to him, the Fortunate One, the Worthy One, the Perfect Sambuddha
ai-pp1.1:2.2_0: the designation of the components, the designation of the sense-spheres, the designation of the sense-spheres, and the designation of the faculties.
ai-pp1.1:3.1_0: In what way is there a designation of the components regarding components?
ai-pp1.1:3.2_0: So far as there are these five components:
ai-pp1.1:3.3_0: The feelings constituent group, the perceptions constituent group, the (volitional) processes constituent group, the consciousness constituent group.
ai-pp1.1:3.4_0: thus far there is a designation of the components regarding components.
ai-pp1.1:4.1_0: In what way is there designation of the sense-spheres regarding the sense-spheres?
ai-pp1.1:4.2_0: So far as there are these twelve sense-spheres:
ai-pp1.1:4.3_0: eye and sights, ear and sounds, nose and smells, tongue and tastes, body and touches.
ai-pp1.1:4.4_0: thus far there is a designation of the sense-spheres regarding the sense-spheres.
ai-pp1.1:5.1_0: In what way is there designation of the elements regarding the elements?
ai-pp1.1:5.2_0: So far as there are these eighteen elements:
ai-pp1.1:5.3_0: The eye element, sight element, and eye consciousness element. The ear element, sound element, and ear consciousness element. The nose element, smell element, and nose consciousness element. The tongue element, taste element, and tongue consciousness element. The body element, touch element, and body consciousness element. The mind element, thought element, and mind consciousness element.
ai-pp1.1:5.4_0: thus far there is a designation of the elements regarding the elements.
ai-pp1.1:6.1_0: In what way is there designation of the truths regarding the truths?
ai-pp1.1:6.2_0: So far as there are these four truths:
ai-pp1.1:6.3_0: The truth of suffering, its origin, its cessation, and the path.
ai-pp1.1:6.4_0: thus far there is a designation of the truths regarding the truths.
ai-pp1.1:7.1_0: In what way is there designation of the faculties regarding the faculties?
ai-pp1.1:7.2_0: So far as there are these twenty-two faculties:
ai-pp1.1:7.3_0: eye, ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind.
ai-pp1.1:7.4_0: thus far there is a designation of the faculties regarding the faculties.
ai-pp1.1:8.1_0: In what way is there a designation of the person regarding persons?
ai-pp1.1:11.1_0: let alone those that are dishonest.
ai-pp1.1:33.1_0: the one neither in training nor beyond training,
ai-pp1.1:34.1_0: I am master of the three knowledges,
ai-pp1.1:38.1_0: the one liberated in both ways,
ai-pp1.1:45.1_0: the one (who returns) seven times at most,
ai-pp1.1:46.1_0: the one who goes from one good family to another good family,
ai-pp1.1:50.1_0: the one who attains Nibbāna before the middle (of the aeon),
ai-pp1.1:51.1_0: the one who attains Nibbāna at the end (of the aeon),
ai-pp1.1:52.1_0: the one who attains Nibbāna with (difficult) conditions,
ai-pp1.1:53.1_0: the one who attains Nibbāna with (difficult) conditions,
ai-pp1.1:54.1_0: one who goes upstream to the highest (divinities),
ai-pp1.1:56.1_0: the one on the path to experiencing the fruit of stream-entry,
ai-pp1.1:58.1_0: the one on the path to experiencing the fruit of once-returning,
ai-pp1.1:60.1_0: the one on the path to experiencing the fruit of non-returning,
ai-pp1.1:62.1_0: the one on the path to experiencing the fruit of Worthiness.
